name: "definitely" not a safe place
description:
Developed for England Summer School Game Course.

Game Story : We are the kinght and archer and we are trying to save the king, queen and the people. So we have to stop the enemies.

This is a co-op game. You need to use 2 Xbox controller.

Producers : Adil Furkan Yıldırım, Ebru Sena Çatana, Mahir Berk Canan
